subtitle: A very easy barbecue recipe! Adapt to create your own recipe.

method.text: Wipe and core the apples. Make a shallow cut through the skin around the middle of each.
In a bowl, mix together the sultanas, lemon, brandy, sugar and softened butter.
Cut out pieces of foil large enough to wrap each apple. Brush one side of each piece of foil with melted butter.
Stand the apples on the buttered side of the foil. Spoon the filling into each hollow.
Gather up the foil to enclose the apple. Twist the top to seal. Cook for 45-50 min on a hot barbecue, until tender.
Carefully, open the foil parcel to serve.

title: Baked stuffed apples
